How to use ### Require the module ```javascript var wgytcraft = require('@wgytcraft/hosting').main ``` ### Use it:  ```javascript wgytcraft(modulesJson, dirname) // modulesJson should be the modules.json file for wgytcraft // dirname should be __dirname
